title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1989/87 of 6 July 1987 fixing for the 1987/88 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1989/87
of 6 July 1987
fixing for the 1987/88 marketing year the amount of the levy in connection with the offsetting of storage costs for sugar
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1987/88 marketing year, the amount of the levy referred to under the second subparagraph of Article 8 (2) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 is hereby fixed at 4,00 ECU per 100 kilograms of white sugar.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 July 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
